alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Northwest Plateau; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 18 at 1:59PM MDT until July 18 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 7 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures up to 100 expected around Farmington, 100 to 104 in the Middle Rio Grande Valley, and 105 to 108 around Tucumcari. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, Northwest Plateau, and Quay County. * WHEN...1 PM to 7 PM MDT Today and Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat-related illnesses such as heat exhaustion and heat stroke.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Northwest Plateau; Quay County
